verses.verse: Then <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> was <WG321> led up <WG321> by <WG5259> the Spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> the wilderness <WG2048> to be tempted <WG3985> by <WG5259> the devil. <WG1228>
When <WG2532> he had fasted <WG3522> forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> and <WG2532> forty <WG5062> nights, <WG3571> he was <WG3983> hungry <WG3983> afterward. <WG5305>

The <WG2532> tempter <WG3985> came <WG4334> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> to him, <WG846> "If <WG1487> you are <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> command <WG2036> that <WG2443> these <WG3778> stones <WG3037> become bread. <WG740>"

But <WG1161> he answered, <WG611> "It <WG2036> is written, <WG1125> <WG444> 'Man shall <WG2198> not <WG3756> live <WG2198> by <WG1909> bread <WG740> alone, <WG3441> but <WG235> by <WG1909> every <WG3956> word <WG4487> that proceeds <WG1607> out <WG1223> of the mouth <WG4750> of God. <WG2316>'"
Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> took <WG3880> him <WG846> into <WG1519> the holy <WG40> city. <WG4172> He <WG2532> set <WG2476> him <WG846> on <WG1909> the pinnacle <WG4419> of the temple, <WG2411>

and <WG2532> said <WG3004> to him, <WG846> "If <WG1487> you are <WG1488> the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> throw <WG906> yourself <WG4572> down, <WG2736> for <WG1063> it is written, <WG3754> <WG1781> 'He will put his <WG846> angels <WG32> in <WG1909> charge <WG1781> of you. <WG4675>' and, <WG2532> <WG1909> 'On their hands <WG5495> they will bear <WG142> you <WG4571> up, <WG142> so that <WG3379> you don't <WG4350> dash your <WG4675> foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone. <WG3037>'"
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG5346> to him, <WG846> "Again, <WG3825> it is written, <WG1125> <WG1598> 'You shall not <WG3756> test <WG1598> the Lord, <WG2962> your <WG4675> God. <WG2316>'"

Again, <WG3825> the devil <WG1228> took <WG3880> him <WG846> to <WG3880> an <WG1519> exceedingly <WG3029> high <WG5308> mountain, <WG3735> and <WG2532> showed <WG1166> him <WG846> all <WG3956> the kingdoms <WG932> of the world, <WG2889> and <WG2532> their <WG846> glory. <WG1391>
He <WG2532> said <WG3004> to him, <WG846> "I will give <WG1325> you <WG4671> all <WG3956> of these things, <WG5023> if <WG1437> you will fall down <WG4098> and worship <WG4352> me. <WG3427>"

Then <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, <WG846> "Get <WG3004> behind me, <WG4567> Satan! For <WG1063> it is written, <WG1125> <WG4352> 'You shall worship the Lord <WG2962> your <WG4675> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> you shall serve <WG3000> him <WG846> only. <WG3441>'"
Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> left <WG863> him, <WG846> and <WG2532> behold, <WG2400> angels <WG32> came <WG4334> and <WG2532> served <WG1247> him. <WG846>
Now <WG1161> when Jesus <WG2424> heard <WG191> that <WG3754> John <WG2491> was delivered <WG3860> up, <WG402> he withdrew into <WG1519> Galilee. <WG1056>

Leaving <WG2641> Nazareth, <WG3478> he came <WG2064> and <WG2532> lived <WG2730> in <WG1519> Capernaum, <WG2584> which <WG3588> is by the sea, <WG3864> in <WG1722> the region <WG3725> of Zebulun <WG2194> and <WG2532> Naphtali, <WG3508>
that <WG2443> it might be fulfilled <WG4137> which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> through <WG1223> Isaiah <WG2268> the prophet, <WG4396> saying, <WG3004>

"The land <WG1093> of Zebulun <WG2194> and <WG2532> the land <WG1093> of Naphtali, <WG3508> toward <WG3598> the sea, <WG2281> beyond <WG4008> the Jordan, <WG2446> Galilee <WG1056> of the Gentiles, <WG1093>

the people <WG2992> who <WG3588> sat <WG2521> in <WG1722> darkness <WG4655> saw <WG1492> a great <WG3173> light, <WG5457> to those <WG846> who <WG3588> sat <WG2521> in <WG1722> the region <WG5561> and <WG2532> shadow <WG4639> of death, <WG2288> to them light <WG5457> has dawned. <WG393>"

From <WG575> that time, <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> began <WG756> to preach, <WG2784> and <WG2532> to say, <WG3004> "Repent! <WG3340> For <WG1063> the Kingdom <WG932> of Heaven <WG3772> is at hand. <WG1448>"

Walking <WG4043> by <WG3844> the sea <WG2281> of Galilee, <WG1056> he <WG2424> saw <WG1492> two <WG1417> brothers: <WG80> Simon, <WG4613> who is called <WG3004> Peter, <WG4074> and <WG2532> Andrew, <WG406> his <WG846> brother, <WG80> casting <WG906> a net <WG293> into <WG1519> the sea; <WG2281> for <WG1063> they were <WG2258> fishermen. <WG231>
He <WG2532> said <WG3004> to them, <WG846> "Come <WG1205> after <WG3694> me, <WG3450> and <WG2532> I will make <WG4160> you <WG5209> fishers <WG231> for men. <WG444>"
They <WG863> immediately <WG2112> left <WG863> their nets <WG1350> and <WG1161> followed <WG190> him. <WG846>

Going <WG2532> on <WG4260> from there, <WG1564> he saw <WG1492> two <WG1417> other <WG243> brothers, <WG80> James <WG2385> the son of Zebedee, <WG2199> and <WG2532> John <WG2491> his <WG846> brother, <WG80> in <WG1722> the boat <WG4143> with <WG3326> Zebedee <WG2199> their <WG846> father, <WG3962> mending <WG2675> their <WG846> nets. <WG1350> He <WG2532> called <WG2564> them. <WG846>
They immediately <WG2112> left <WG863> the boat <WG4143> and <WG2532> their <WG846> father, <WG3962> and <WG2532> followed <WG190> him. <WG846>

Jesus <WG2424> went <WG2532> about <WG4013> in all <WG3650> Galilee, <WG1056> teaching <WG1321> in <WG1722> their <WG846> synagogues, <WG4864> preaching <WG2784> the Good News <WG2098> of the Kingdom, <WG932> and <WG2532> healing <WG2323> every disease and <WG2532> every sickness <WG3554> among <WG1722> the people. <WG2992>

The <WG2532> report <WG189> about him <WG846> went <WG565> out <WG1519> into all <WG3956> Syria. <WG4947> They brought <WG4374> to him <WG846> all <WG3956> who <WG2192> were <WG2560> sick, <WG4912> afflicted with various <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> and <WG2532> torments, <WG931> possessed with demons, <WG1139> epileptics, <WG4583> and <WG2532> paralytics; <WG3885> and <WG2532> he healed <WG2323> them. <WG846>
Great multitudes <WG4183> from Galilee, <WG1056> Decapolis, <WG1179> Jerusalem, <WG2414> Judea <WG2449> and <WG2532> from <WG575> beyond <WG4008> the Jordan <WG2446> followed <WG190> him. <WG846>
